resources.string: Who we are. What we do. How to contact us.
All of the podcasts the network has to offer.
Hosted by Eric Eslinger and Phil Bowen
Geekdays is our daily news and information show, bringing you the latest things from the world of geek culture, every single Geekday!
Automated truck convoys, commercialized space flight, and sex. Yep, it\'s Geekdays.
People are jerks online, women can change their brains, and convenience stores get into the drones game. We\'ve got some good stuff for you today on Geekdays.
Killer Robots, PCs without Porn, and Death Stars. It\'s good to be a Geekdays.
